testimonials.title: Our testimonials

kuba.title: House very well maintained
kuba.text: Highly recommend, great place, includes all the necessary things to stay with a child! Very nice and quick contact with the owners, who will suggest and help solve any possible problem."

monika.title: New, luxuriously furnished house
monika.text: I highly recommend a vacation in this beautiful house. Charming town, beach, and plenty of water activities. Perfect place to relax and get away from everyday life."

nik.title: Literally everything you need
nik.text: The neighborhood is quiet. Lots of restaurants. Very helpful staff. The owner to get along in every subject. Ms. Anita very helpful on site you can always ask for help."

adam.title: A great place for vacation
adam.text: You live comfortably, conveniently, two bathrooms, there is internet, well, and there is a warm pool, close to markets, close to the sea, there is a place to park a car."

about.title: Information about the house with photos

house.firstPart: The house has everything you need for a carefree vacation. There are three bedrooms (for 8 people), two bathrooms, a huge and spacious terrace, and a heated swimming pool. Even in winter, you can relax and swim in water with a temperature of 30 degrees.
house.secondPart: The house has all the necessary equipment. If you have a small child, there are toys, strollers, a high chair, and a bottle warmer for them. Unfortunately, we do not allow pets.

vicinity.firstPart: Our beautiful house is in the well-developed town of San Pedro del Pinatar. It offers everything for an unforgettable vacation, with shopping centers, cafes, restaurants, parks, and the beach all within walking distance. Information about nearby attractions is available below.
vicinity.secondPart: There are many parking spaces near the house. The nearest airports are Alicante (1 hour away) and Murcia (36 minutes away). If you need a car, you can arrange a transfer with the Calma company.

rentInfo.firstPart: It's worth mentioning that we are on both Booking.com and Airbnb. If you don't feel confident, you can book the property through these two popular services. However, to save money, feel free to book directly with us by sending a message or giving us a call to arrange the dates.
rentInfo.secondPart: Once you are ready to make a reservation, please contact Mrs. Anita Violleta Kołodziejczyk. She is responsible for your booking and will be on-site to assist you with your reservation.

slider.loungeFromOutside: A contemporary living room featuring a white couch and table, creating a sleek and minimalist ambiance.
slider.lounge: A modern living room with white walls and a large television
slider.diningRoom: Clean and modern dining room setup with elegant furniture.
slider.kitchen: A well-lit kitchen with a wooden table and chairs, creating a cozy and inviting dining area.
slider.doubleRoom: Luxurious bedroom featuring a large bed
slider.twinRoomDark: Two beds in a room with a colorful wall mural. A vibrant and cozy space for relaxation and rest.
slider.twinRoomLight: A cozy bedroom with two beds and a stylish rug, creating a comfortable and inviting atmosphere.
slider.bathFirst: A luxurious bathroom with elegant marble walls and pristine white fixtures.
slider.bathSecond: Luxurious white bathroom featuring marble walls and floor.
slider.terasaEnter: A modern home with a patio and stairs leading to the entrance.
slider.terasa: Rooftop patio with lounge chairs and table, perfect for relaxing outdoors.
slider.pool: Stylish villa with swimming pool and patio, offering a serene and elegant outdoor space.

vicinity.title: Places we recommend to visit
vicinity.subtitle: Must-See Destinations for Your Next Adventure

contacts.title: Booking Procedure

firstCol.thirdPart: If you prefer, you can book through these services. To save money, contact us directly to arrange dates or for assistance with connections.

bookProcedure.secondCol: Check the details: which airlines, departure city, and flight times. Book your dates accordingly. Without this information, standard check-in is at 16:00 and check-out at 11:00.
bookProcedure.thirdCol: You can always contact us after purchasing your ticket. If possible, we will try to accommodate your schedule. If you know your flight times, we will adjust the calendar to your requirements.

contacts.subtitle: How to Book Your Reservation: Step-by-Step Guide

paymentSchedule.firstCol: The first transfer is about 20-30% of the total amount and we expect it within 72 hours.
paymentSchedule.secondCol: The second transfer is half of the remaining amount, due about halfway to your arrival date.
paymentSchedule.thirdCol: The third transfer is the final installment before your arrival. To check in, the total amount must be credited to our account.

firstPart.title: Still have questions ? Call Ewelina Kwaśna

important.secondPart: each of us, besides renting, has another job.
